LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Sword.label: Dragoon Combat Sword
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Sword.description: A two-handed great sword used by dragoon, it is specially designed to fight against large creatures and war machines, and has the functions of a machete and an armor-piercing hammer. Its own weight makes it very effective even when used to clear light infantry and fortifications.
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Sword.tools.poke.label: poke
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Sword.tools.sweep.label: sweep
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Sword.tools.stock.label: stock
